channel.title: Comedy on The Guyana Brief
channel.description: Recent content in Comedy on The Guyana Brief

item.title: Speedeet & Wilar: De Chinese Restaurant Adventure
item.description: When Wilar’s uncle knows the owner of a Chinese restaurant near Kitty Cinema, the boys get a behind-the-scenes tour that changes everything Speedeet thought he knew about fried rice.

item.title: Daily Laugh: De Report-A-Hole Disaster
item.description: Government launches pothole app. Uncle Ramesh becomes their #1 user. Chaos ensues. Yellow paint involved.
